page.title: 18BOND HELICOPTERS
page.content: BOND HELICOPTERS; NORTH DENES AIRFIELD; GT. YARMOUTH 23 years ago, David Bond founded the firm. North Denes Airfield is divided into two halves,owned by two companies,Bond & Bristow. British Airways helicopters also use the airfield. Simon Bedford showed us two helicopters, one French and one American. The French one was claustrophobic and the tail rotors were set in the tail itself.The other machine was more spacious. The Heliport has 3 machines, costing an average Â£1.3M.The largest can do 200 mph and carry 12 passengers. While we were in the helicopter, one of us was tye pilot, one a co-pilot, & the rest passengers. Inside was a various amount of controls like a lit Christmas Tree, most of which we couldn't understand.
